page.title: 19Sports And Clubs
page.content: What sports I do depends on what season it is. During winter I play badminton twice a week and often play football with my friends after school. At school I play football and rugby outside and basketball, badminton and gymnastics indoors. During rugby our teacher makes us do a cross country run in sub-zero temperatures. On the other hand in summer if the weather is nice I play tennis at the lawn tennis association in The Walk opposite the cricket club. As long as the grass is dry I play cricket with my friends and also at school. At school I also like doing athletics. In athletics we usually do one track event and one field event. Antony Mariani Form 1E Age: 12 (I Typed all the Owens information in)
